column4: how do I get my nameservers into etc/resolv.conf permanently? I have resolverconf installed, and the nameservers are listed correctly in /etc/network/interfaces as dns-nameservers IP1 IP2
are you getting a dynamic IP from dhcp? it will overwrite resolv.conf
no, fixed IP, these are virtual machines I have set up ...
I want to use one as a webserver, so I need a fixed IP for it.
